hesml.taxonomy

Interface IHalfEdge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HalfEdge

    public interface IHalfEdge
    This interface represents an abstract oriented edge (half-edge) within a taxonomy as defined in the paper below. Lastra-Díaz, J. J., and García-Serrano, A. (2016). HESML: a scalable ontology-based semantic similarity measures library with a set of reproducible experiments and a replication dataset. To appear in the Information Systems Journal.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-Díaz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IEdge getEdge()
      This function returns the non-oriented edge that contains the current instance.
      OrientedEdgeType getEdgeType()
      This functions returns the type of the edge within the taxonomy.
      IHalfEdge getNext()
      This function returns the next outcoming edges from the target vertex.
      IHalfEdge getOpposite()
      This functions returns the opposite paired oriented-edge.
      IVertex getTarget()
      This function returns the target vertex pointed by the current edge.
      double getWeight()
      This function returns the weight value of this half-edge
      void setWeight(double weight)
      This function sets the weight value associated to the current instance of the oriented edge.

    • Method Detail

      • getEdgeType

        OrientedEdgeType getEdgeType()
        This functions returns the type of the edge within the taxonomy. Currently, the oriented edge only supports two types in order to distinguish between ascending (SubClassOf) or descending (SuperClassOF) edges. The same scheme will allow in the future to support other distinguished relationships between taxonomy nodes, called vertexes in HESML..
        Returns:
        The type of edge

      • getNext

        IHalfEdge getNext()
        This function returns the next outcoming edges from the target vertex.
        Returns:
        The next edge around the source vertex.

      • getTarget

        IVertex getTarget()
        This function returns the target vertex pointed by the current edge.
        Returns:
        the vertex pointed by this arc.

      • getEdge

        IEdge getEdge()
        This function returns the non-oriented edge that contains the current instance.
        Returns:
        The owner full edge joining the paired oriented edges

      • getOpposite

        IHalfEdge getOpposite()
        This functions returns the opposite paired oriented-edge.
        Returns:
        Opposite edge

      • getWeight

        double getWeight()
        This function returns the weight value of this half-edge
        Returns:
        Weight value used in asymmetric shortest path computation.

      • setWeight

        void setWeight(double weight)
        This function sets the weight value associated to the current instance of the oriented edge.
        Parameters:
        weight - New weight value
